tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Braces Fixing,
review:
Really it's great being get treated  with Dr.chakravarthi.
In the 1st visit I love the place which make me so comfortable.
It's been a long travel for me in my dental specialist .Everything went  great .At last the 100% satisfaction is needed that I got completely.Artificial bone surgery , 3 implant and crowns and bridge most of I have done everything in dental I think so as it's a major problem for me.It's a front teeth for me I feel so bad that it LL not be as natural but I feel it's so natural now my friends and other people who see me thy can't find at all it's artificial.Really I'm smiling by showing my full teeth its only becz of my special doctor Dr.Chakravarthi.
Thank you sir for your kind ,happy,soft, gentle and full satisfactor nature of work made my treatment  so complet and your care for each patients is really awesome.
* ********* ** ****** ********** *** * **** ****** ********* ** ********

Hey,
 I was referred to 'My Dental Specialist' by my sister Dr. Krithi Sharma which I guess was the best decision.

Dr. A. Chakravarthy is seriously the master of the game. His work is pure precision. If you want a hassle free and best treatment then just blindfold your eyes and rest yourself at ' My Dental Specialist', everything else will be taken care of by them. Have any doubt's and you will be answered wisely. Afraid of pain? Don't worry, I just felt a negligible needle prick in the whole treatment of 6 months. I seriously did not even feel a thing after root canal.! Which sounded so big to me coz of what people said earlier to me. They are having all the latest technologies equipped with them to give you a flawless treatment and results. If you go to them once you will never feel like going anywhere else in the futu*** ** *** *** ******** **** **** *** **** *** **** ** ***** 

Your smiling patient
Abhinav Sharma

I work at a shop below My Dental Specialist. When Dr.  Chakravarthy saw me he asked me to come see him for my teeth. I had very odd shape for my teeth with big gas since childhood. My friends used to say that I have rat like teeth. I never thought I can have normal teeth. That is when Dr Chakravarthy showed me photos of other cases he had corrected. It was like a dream. I straight away fixed an appointment. After he was done and I saw my teeth in the mirror I could not believe that my teeth were looking like this. One sitting.  One evening. That's it. New smile, new confidence. A new me. Thank you so much.

I had severe tooth ache and could not find a dentist anywhere. My son in law called uo doctor chakravarthy late night and he offered to come and open the clinic for us. I had a big cavity in my wisdom tooth and was taking medicines for it for one week but it was not helping. I have a fear of injections so I never went to a dentist. But my first injection given by him was totally painless. I got my tooth removed with no pain. He said I could travel next morning itself.  Very happy that I came to My Dental Specialist. Will come again for further treatments.

I got to know about Dr.Catherine from Dr.Chakravarthy. I have just started with my Orthodontic treatment last month. I had initially just come for an opinion, as a couple of other dentists I went to, said that I would need a surgery as well, apart from braces, and I wasnt keen on getting a surgery.The Orthodontist here, clarified all my doubts and explained to me clearly as to what my condition is like and why I wouldn't require a surgery. So, that was a huge plus for me, as I was mentally relieved, that I don't need to go through any such hassle. Secondly, Dr.Chakravarthy, also ensured that he would be taking care of my oral hygiene requirements as well, during the course of my treatment, and explained to me how important it is. So, I got treatments such as air polishing, fluoride application and some restorations done before the start of my treatment. I opted for ceramic braces. Its just been a month now, and I am happy with it! :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Chakravarthy and his team were very courteous and were able to diagnose the problem in a very short span time. RCT was done neatly and did not feel any pain at all post procedure. Would definitely recommend him to my known friends for any dental issues.

-Amrith

I had a restoration and air polishing done. This clinic offers the best treatment compared to any other clinic. I have never heard about air polishing before , in my dental specialist they impliment the recent advances in dentistry. I thank Dr. Chakravarthy and my dental specialist for their best treatment offered. I would like to also  mention about the sterilization techniques which is really unique to this clinic.

I have a big cavity in my tooth. Had pain. Went for a filling to a dentist. Was given a filling but it came off. Came to my dental specialist on my sister's recommendation. Got it filled. Looks just like my tooth. Can't even make out any difference. Very happy. Thanks

I am a 70 year old man. I have never been to a dentist in my life. I had a very big swelling on my face. Left side was so swollen. I got scared. My son in law took me to My Dental Specialist. We met Dr Chakravarthy. He had a look and told me its nothing big to worry about. Gave me medicines. I feel so much better. No problems now. I had a badly broken tooth which needs to be removed. Will surely come for removal after 3 days.Thanks for making my first dental visit so comfortable.

Got many missing teeth. Had them removed in childhood. Now having  difficulties in eating. Other teeth are tilting and have cavities. Was advised about importance of good oral hygiene and maintenance. Will do hereon. Detailed explanation about treatment options.Will decide and undertake treatment.

reply_text: Thank you for your words of appreciation. It was a pleasure to treat you. Keep smiling. Best wishes. Dr. Chakravarthy.

review: Dr chakravarthy is a marvelous dentist who is young but at the top of his game. His attention to detail is amazing and he is meticulous in his treatment and explaining what he is going to do. He constantly researches and uses the best techniques and equipment.  Would strongly recommend him to anyone with any dental issues

I came with a discoloured tooth. It was not causing any pain. Just that the colour was not fine. Dr Chakravarthy suggested that I take an x ray. I was surprised to know that I had an infection in my tooth and jaw. He promptly suggested Root canal treatment to help me get better. Glad that I came at the right time.Thanks.

I had a very comfortable and timely treatement, had 1 root canal and an additional cap replacement both of which were completed in 2 sittings. The fittings are very comfortable and the treatments were not taxing. Unlike many other dentists, the crowns were also reasonably priced with 15 years warranty.

Just stepped in for consultation and the dentist here checked my teeth condition and advised great method of cleansing process by air polishing . I got the knowledge of the importance  of maintaining healthier teeth. And also came know about the side effects caused due to bad maintenance of our teeth. Thank you.

Had pain in upper back tooth. Got root canal treatment. Was very comfortable. No issue with tooth. Did a ceramic crown. Was a laser cut crown. Tooth like natural. Very good ambience in clinic. Nice treatment  comfort level is high. Doctor is very responsive and understandin

I came with a small swelling inside my cheeks and was worried about about the pain that could be felt during removing it . Fear of pain kept me from doing any treatment for past 6 months. I was suggested to get a laser removal of growth. I thought it may pain. But to my surprise nothing of that's sorts happened , the whole process went smooth with any issues!!! Really happy with the laser treatment at My Dental Specialist.

Super and my teeth is very bright! Really a great job. Painless. Anti cavity coat feels so smooth and tastes great. Landed from Malaysia. Was recommended in flight by a dental student. Was a pleasant visit. Will surely come again and refer my friends.

I came to Dr Chakravarthy after my son in law recommended him to me. I have lot of health issues. I have diabetes and bypass operations. The doctor explained me the treatment options very clearly and spent a lot of time with me . very happy with the way I was treated.

I had a broken front tooth. Got fillings done many times. But was not satisfied since they discoloured regularly. That's when I came to 'My dental specialist'. I was shown on an X ray that my tooth needed root canal after which I got a ceramic crown. Looks great. No one could make out that I had a crown. Glad that I have a sparkling white new tooth. Treatment was very fast and was done in just 2 appointmens. Very much pleased.

I had a few fillings done a few years ago. They broke down. Since I go to gym regularly and lift weights I needed very strong fillings. That is when I was referred to Dr Chakravarthy @ 'My Dental Specialist'. I was offered glassfiber reinforced composite fillings with nanotechnology. Really superb. So strong. Don't feel any pain when I bite .looks like tooth. Can't even tell the difference. Really glad to have opted for treatment here.

'My dental specialist' clinic is very good and neat. Clinic display posters and  stickers are very good and useful to people.Treatment is awesome.The doctor treating me is very kind and soft .My dentist Dr A. Chakravarthy is a specialist in rootcanal. His treatment is very safe and comfortable.☺☺

It was a very nice experience at 'MY DENTAL SPECIALIST'. I was treated with great care and was explained about the treatment very clearly by my dentist Dr A. Chakravarthy. Pleasure to be treated by him. He made the treatment so somfortable and painless. Would recommend to all my friends.

Referred by my sister. Beautiful clinic. Easily accessible. Bang on the main road. Doctor explained treatment options with models and videos. Photographs to show cases done by him. Very smart and practical approach. Really happy. Must visit 'MY DENTAL SPECIALIST' For treatment by Dr A. chakravarthy.

This is an awesome clinic. They are very friendly, I get the best treatment here. The doctor asks or enquires the specialist in that subject, before starting the treatment. I would suggest every friend of mine to this clinic so that they don't lose any tooth;-).

Smart dentist. Referred by a relative. Well setup clinic. Ambience is superb. Very neat and well maintained. Digital documentation. Helpful staff. Lift access is convenient. Easily located on main road itself. Recommend to all. Come experience true dentistry.

Doctor and his team are very supportive.

By far what so ever I am happy with treatment.
Was referred by my friend for dental treatment. Had some violins to be done. Got them done at ' my dental specialist' . was economical. Happy with the treatment.
Clinic was located on main road and was very easy to locate. The doctor explained very well. Nice experience. Thank you.
Good. Nice work. Had stains on my teeth. Got air polishing done at my dental specialist. Teeth feel nice and clean. Need some more work on teeth. Will come again
Good and proper meeting. All the care was taken to go for painless treatment. Doctor was friendly. Ambience was also great.
Well equipped clinic with advanced dental chairs .Nice hospitality . It was a nice time being in your clinic . We got a idea how a dental clinic should be.
Good clinic with well equipped dental chair and instruments. Good, silent ambience with good patient flow. One of the best clinic in neighborhood
The clinic is apt for its name...the doctor is truly specialist in his work. The clinic is really well established in the right area.
The location of the clinic is a nice place.The features in the clinic are really good and have the latest technology. The doctor is very interactive and has very good skills.
The setup is good *** *** ********* ** ********** The doctor is friendly and really approachable he is very good in diagnosis and treatment planning

review: Treatment was explained clearly with all the available options and the doctor was very polite and easy going. He explained every step that is being carried on and the treatment was perfect! I recommend My Dental Specialist!

I came to my dental specialist for treating gaps in my teeth. Dr Chakravarthy suggested me invisible aligners. Showed video's and explained the procedure. Very clear. Thanks. Will take up the treatment here.
It was good.I was shown what has been done to my tooth,that made me satisfactory.Hope if the prices are less I would always recommend People to visit him.

The dentist was patient enough to answer all my queries.I felt
confident about the course of treatment suggested by him.
Structured approach in treatment. Explained the process clearly. Overall very pleasant experience with the treatment
Quite satisfied with the treatments given. Very good in explaining. Child treated in a good way. Good day!
This was an unplanned visit. Got cavities but didn't know. After consultation doctor told me we can fill them. Got it attended to early. Guess a stitch in time really does save nine. Thanks
I  had crooked teeth. Came for correction. Got Composite veneering don't. One visit only. Teeth look like straighter. Good job. Thanks
Big cavity. Severe tooth pain. Not control. Doctor gave medicine. Feel relief now. Thank you. Was not able to eat or speak also. Doctor do root canal for me. Save teeth and do cap.
It was a great a experience. Everything was explained in detail and the quality of the work produced was brilliant.

Ambience _ very comfortable!!!!!!!
Treatment _very good!!
Would recommend to all my family members and friends!!!!
Had a good and pleasant experience . brilliant service. Excellent ambience. Loved every minute of it. Had a lot of fun. Looking forward to my next appointment.
Came with severe pain. Was travelling. Could not eat for past two days. Doctor did emergency management. Feel total relief. Thanks a lot. Treatment was painless.
The clinic is very hygienic,very comfortable.********* ** **** ********enjoyed a lot.learnt something new.......

The doc made me feel at ease. Absolutely no pain felt during the entire process. Very sterile procedure was adopted and friendly environment. The process was well outlined ahead hence I didnt have any apprehensions during the treatment
Came for tooth extraction. Had lot of pain. Doctor did treatment and saved my tooth. Treatment was not painful.  Thanks.

I came for my ortho treatment, and got air polishing done as well. I can visibly see the difference in terms of plaque being completely removed from all the difficult to-reach surfaces ,due to the braces. Would strongly recommend this one!

The best Chennai has to offer, right from the ambience to the quality of treatment (it is sheer craftsman ship). Seldom does life give you beyond your expectations; seize it and smile with a pure belief of satisfaction!!
Came to My Dental Specialist for regular check up. Got teeth cleaned. Friendly staff. Felt warm and welcomed. Teeth feel great. Thanks

He's very friendly and goes out of his way to explain procedures in detail. He's also reachable in case of any issues and complications. 

The procedure went smoothly.

Very nice clinic/ Dr Chakravarthy is very good with understanding of my problem.. Very hygienic treatment area and clean instruments. Videos shown explained the treatment clearly. Thank you for the wonderful experience
Excellent service.thank you . Got cleaning done for my 3 year old son. Painless. He was so happy with the white teeth. And he loved the glasses..
I had a nice experience on the whole. The doctor patiently explained the procedures which made me very comfortable. Very meticulous and thorough job he had done. Thank you

Dr.Chakravarthy was referred to me by my sister. He was excellent in his work. I had huge cavities. He restored them beautifully. Cant even make out the fillings. Absolutely tooth like natural. the clinic is very clean... Really cool place to be at..
Came with tooth stains. Got cleaning done at ' My Dental Specialist' . Very nice place . Very happy. Cleaning was good. Got tooth polishing done also. Thanks
Came for a regular check up. Doctor explained about importance of maintaining oral hygiene and appreciated my regular visits. Explained about air polishing. Waiting to get it done soon. Thanks

The doctor  is very  friendly and caring.
He explain everything before and treatment. Next day after the treatment he calls and ask if everything is OK.I will recommend the Dr Tony friends and relatives.

Great experience with Dr. Chakravarthy!! The place is very next to my apartment and the service he offered after analysing my tooth for half an hour , gave factual details of the status of my teeth. Thanks
An awesome dental clinic with a very good dentist...the clinic ambience is really good with caring professional... "My preferable Dentist"...:)
Good recommendations and great treatment. Very helpful, diagnosis was explained well and was offered choice of treatment for consideration
Different from the regular cleaning. Faster way. No pain sensed. Thank you for accommodating us on a Sunday and being so patient
Came with tooth ache. Dr Chakravarthy did a fantastic job of relieving my pain. Told me about other problems too with photographs. Very happy. Thanks
Came with pain in gums. Had a boil for past two days. Doctor said I had an abscess due to popcorn skin stuck between gums. Took care of it. Was painless. Great job
Treatment was good it felt that my teeth were really c!eaned and protected. Most importantly the Doctor was honest to tell what was important to look after and protect my teeth.

Very good treatment. The doctor treatment is very kind @ polite. The Clinic is very clean @ neat @ good staff. My dental specialist clinic is safe our tooth. The doctor name is Dr. Chakravarthy.......☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺
It was a very good treatment with very less pain. Doctor Chakravathy was very friendly. High quality technical equipment is being used. Very satisfied with the ambience and the treatment given
Doctor Chakravarthi was very friendly and kind and helped to better understand the problem and the treatment advised in detail.
Amazing work, felt very comfortable and am very satisfied with the result. Very esthetic setup, excellent service. Keep up the good work.

It was a great experience being here. Every step was explained in detail and we were kept aware of the procedure the whole time, which was commendable. I'm very happy with my teeth now and more confident of my smile.

My dental specialist has been a wonderful experience. Wasn't aware about the harm done to my teeth due to previous treatment. Thank you doctor for making my teeth better and cleaner. Waiting to learn much more from you. Thank you, sir :)

Did my treatment at another place/ was not very happy. Denturevwas quite loose and used to irritate gums. Doctors at my Dental Specialist made me a very nice denture. Really happy with the treatment. Thanks.

I had visited the clinic for a general dental checkup and it was a fun, friendly and pleasant experience with Dr. Chakravarthy who had explained my problem in detail followed by all the possible treatment options. Looking forward to come back soon.
Really good job by doctor. No pain. Got immediate appointment. Card payment facility available. Recommended to all. All the best
My dental specialist clinic is good kind treatment. Neat and perfect clinic. Very good doctor and very friendly.☺☺☺☺☺

World class clinic. Simply superp and an ideal clinic for treatment.

Very sound, knowledgable and highly experienced Dentist who is patients friendly.

Came with gum problem and stains on teeth. Doctor did air polishing. No pain at all. No bleeding from gums. No fear of infection. Earlier used to get scaling done. Very happy with the latest treatments.
Nice clinic. Treatment was done fast. No waiting. Economical . clean, new instruments was used. Very happy with doctor's treatment
The doctor was friendly and very polite. He explained everything clearly beforehand.tThe treatment was very effective.
The doctor is friendly and polite and he clearly explained everything and the treatment was very effective.
Excellent dentist. My son's recommendation. Truly worthwhile. Painless treatment. Hygienic and well maintained clinic.
Doctor was very nice. Treatment was so nice. No pain. The anti cavity cream was so tasty. Nice colourful clinic. Assistant is very sweet.
Nice experience. Prompt treatment. Helpful and kind staff. Humble staff. Clean surroundings. Easy and convenient access with lift.
It was a very nice experience. Removed my fear of dentistry. Posh and clean clinic. Kind staff and nice doctor. Definetly MY DENTAL SPECIALIST hereon!!!
Excellent treatment!! Good ambience. Swift response. Friendly staff. Convenient location and parking. Highly recommended!!

I appreciate the following:
Time this doctor takes to explain the procedure in detail.
Providing suggestions on how to maintain your teeth going forward.
for past 2months i suffer tooth problem. My friend suggest me to go Dr.A Chakravarthy. After i met Dr. A.Chakravarthy, he solved my problem with in 1 month. His performance is very good.

I came here a year back for cleaning my tooth. I found doc chakravarthy a different personality and he was very courteous and friendly.  I cud see the spark in him that time itself. When I came back this year, he patiently explained me the problems of my tooth and started workingfrom march 17 and ........ Now in June, I HV changed 5 caps and did feeling younger by 15 yes.!!!!!! Great place to be in!!!!!
.
reply_text: Words like these make us feel blessed and fill us with a sense of pride. Thank you so much Sir for these kind words. Glad to have met you and being able to help you feel nice. Afterall there is no better way to thank than to see a wonderful smile. Here is to a long and sweet friendship

context: Dental Crowns,Composite tooth filling,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr Chakravarthy is a great dentist to have . very helpful and walks you through the whole procedure and keeps you informed of what is being done unlike quite some other doctors I have met.
He gives you all possible options available for the treatments and counsels pretty well.
His practice is absolutely great and pretty sleek and very easy to locate as well.
